messages.title: Build a Brighter Future
messages.content: Invest in our NHS & social care by putting a penny on income tax

messages.title: Affordable homes for local people
messages.content: Britain is in the middle of a housing crisis. People are crying out for genuinely affordable homes. We will invest in new social housing and require all new homes to be carbon neutral by 2021.

messages.title: Support for Lib Dems Surges
messages.content: People across Britain are backing the Liberal Democrats to deliver the brighter future our country deserves. Only a Liberal Democrat government can tackle the climate crisis and stop Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in our NHS & social care by putting a penny on income tax.
Investing in new zero carbon homes for social rent that local people can afford.
Fighting to prevent climate change and improve our environment.
A Liberal Democrat majority government will revoke article 50 to end the Brexit nightmare.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat majority government will revoke article 50 to end the Brexit nightmare.
issues.environment: Fighting to prevent climate change and improve our environment.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS & social care by putting a penny on income tax. When people turn up for help, too often help is not there. 63,000 EU nationals work in the NHS in England. The Conservatives and Brexit have failed our NHS.
issues.lawCrime: We would invest in tackling knife crime.

community.content: Affordable homes for local people. Britain is in the middle of a housing crisis. People are crying out for genuinely affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ben has been fighting cross party to demand better for local residents. Ben has been pushing for increases in affordable housing for local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Ben has served on the Borough council, getting elected in May 2019. Ben has campaigned for, and delivered affordable housing for local people.

endorsements.endorsement: Jo Swinson and Lib Dems are offering hope to the country.

quotes.text: Only a Liberal Democrat government can deliver brighter future our country deserves.

images.caption: Ben J Martin, Listening to local people, demanding better for Sittingbourne and Sheppey.
Ben J Martin Housing development should be led by the needs of the community not property developers.
